alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 9:24PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Gilchrist, west central Bradford, Alachua, southwestern Baker, western Union, Columbia and east central Suwannee Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 923 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Columbia to near Archer. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Lake City, Worthington Spring, Ichetucknee Spring, Columbia, Alachua, High Springs, Archer, Fort White and Worthington Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua
